Description.Text: Facilities Guests can feel at home in one of the 92 rooms. Services and facilities at the hotel include a dining area and a conference room. Wireless internet access is available to travellers. Those arriving in their own vehicles can leave them in the car park of the hotel. Rooms The accommodation features rooms with air conditioning. All rooms offer a fridge and a safe. The establishment offers family rooms and non-smoking rooms. Sports/Entertainment The hotel offers guests a range of leisure and recreation facilities, including a spa (for a fee).
